bibl.title: The Mysterious Fayum Portraits. Faces from Ancient Egypt. Foreword by Dorothy J. THOMPSON.
bibl.note: I. Graeco-Roman Egypt. - II. The Portraits. - III. The Find-Sites. - Commentaries on the Portraits. - Pp. 229-233 et 239-240: Problems in the Dating of the Mummy Portraits, by Barbara BORG.
DOXIADIS Euphrosyne, The Mysterious Fayum Portraits. Faces from Ancient Egypt. Foreword by Dorothy J. THOMPSON.
London, Thames and Hudson, 1995, 4°, 248 pp., 124 ill. coul., 150 ill. n./bl. ISBN 0-500-23713-1. £48.
